subject: Athletics and Sports
Television
lead_paragraph: Simmons, whose relationship with ESPN ended in May, will host a weekly talk show and has a production deal to make video podcasts and documentaries for a network that should give him a wide berth.
snippet: Simmons, whose relationship with ESPN ended in May, will host a weekly talk show and has a production deal to make video podcasts and documentaries for a network that should give him a wide berth.
